abstract: Ben S. Bernanke expressed concern today over trade imbalances between emerging and industrial nations.
snippet: Ben S. Bernanke expressed concern today over trade imbalances between emerging and industrial nations.
lead_paragraph: BERLIN, Sept. 11 — The Federal Reserve chairman, Ben S. Bernanke, said today that heavy saving by oil producers and Asian nations has helped depress interest rates by keeping financial markets flush with cash. But he warned against banking on this effect — one that probably helped create the current financial crisis — for the long term.

headline.main: Fed Chief Concerned on Trade Balance
